p: The desired determination moisture content ranged from 2 % to 20 %, the moisture content for packaging, storing, handling and processing. The samples were rewetted by adding predetermining amount of the water to obtain the desire moisture content. The preparation followed the procedure of Shen and Chen [ 22]. Samples were mixed with water and stored in plastic containers. After mixing, samples were stored at 5 °C for two weeks to ensure uniform distribution of moisture content. Because of the lower storage temperature, no microbial growth was found during the two weeks’ storage.
